TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CompatibleFramework extends System.Object

summary.span: 응용 프로그램을 설치 및 실행할 수 있는 .NET Framework의 버전을 나타냅니다.

span.span: Represents a version of the .NET Framework where an application can install and run.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Profile As String
public: property System::String ^ Profile { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 응용 프로그램을 설치 및 실행할 수 있는 .NET Framework 버전의 프로필을 지정합니다.

span.span: Specifies the profile of the .NET Framework version where an application can install and run.
A string that represents the profile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 버전이 [!INCLUDE[net_client_v40_long](~/includes/net-client-v40-long-md.md)], 속성은 "클라이언트"를 반환 합니다.If the .NET Framework version is [!INCLUDE[net_client_v40_long](~/includes/net-client-v40-long-md.md)], the property returns "Client". .NET Framework 버전이 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], 속성이 "Full"을 반환 합니다.If the .NET Framework version is [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the property returns "Full".

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SupportedRuntime As String
public: property System::String ^ SupportedRuntime { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 응용 프로그램을 설치 및 실행할 수 있는 .NET Framework의 런타임 버전 번호를 지정합니다.

span.span: Specifies the runtime version number of the .NET Framework where an application can install and run.
A string that represents the runtime version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 새 버전의.NET Framework 이전에 릴리스된 버전의 런타임에에서 작동할 수 있습니다.New versions of the .NET Framework may operate on previously-released versions of the runtime.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TargetVersion As String
public: property System::String ^ TargetVersion { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 응용 프로그램을 설치 및 실행할 수 있는 .NET Framework의 버전을 지정합니다.

span.span: Specifies the version of the .NET Framework where an application can install and run.
A string that represents the version.
